translators.translators.PandaPowerAdapter¶

class translators.translators.PandaPowerAdapter(network, injections)¶

Bases: PowerflowSimulator

Converts from the common network to PandaPower networks and solves using Pandapower simulations

Parameters:

  • network (class:Network.Network) – Common network element to be simulated

  • injections – Common injection element that stores time data regarding loads and generators
